job_title: Senior Business Analyst With CPQ and Java
jd: From: Kranthi, Propelsys kranthi@propelsys.com Reply to: kranthi@propelsys.com Full time role with Birlasoft (NO C2C) Position: Senior Business Analyst With CPQ and Java Location: Austin, TX / Houston, TX On Site From Day 1 Employment Type: Full-time Experience Level: 5-10 years Visa GC USC Required Skills & Experience: 5-10 years of Business Analysis experience, preferably with expertise in Java-based applications. Strong functional knowledge of enterprise applications, specifically within coding and deal management systems. Solid understanding of Java technologies and their role in supporting backend operations. Proficiency in creating and maintaining design documents and translating business needs into actionable technical requirements. Ability to work proactively, engage with business teams, and provide analytical insights. Experience in analytics, process flow analysis, and requirement documentation. Familiarity with legacy-to-modern application migrations is a plus. Preferred Skills: Experience with CPQ processes (Configure, Price, Quote) and related services. Knowledge of BPA (Business Process Automation).
